synopsis.text: Hyakkou Private Academy, a prestigious institution for the elite, has an unconventional curriculum that emphasizes gambling to groom its students in the art of negotiation and reading opponents. Enter Yumeko Jabami, a compulsive gambler with an insatiable appetite for high-stakes challenges. As Yumeko's reputation soars, the student council's influence wanes, leading to a power vacuum. In a bid to restore balance, student council president Kirari Momobami announces an election for the next president, with a twist. Each student receives one chip, and the one with the most chips at the end of 30 days becomes the president and the head of the Momobami clan. However, chips aren't the only things at stake, as students engage in a ruthless battle for supremacy, risking everything from their possessions to their physical well-being. With the arrival of eleven transfer students, each with unique abilities and aspirations to lead the school and the Momobami clan, the stage is set for a macabre game of survival and power. Can Yumeko navigate this treacherous landscape and emerge victorious, or will her addiction to risk lead to her downfall? Only time will tell in this thrilling anime that explores the dark side of gambling and ambition.
